TopicTitle: Can I move the space center?

Articles.Content:
I have been trying to see if it is possible to move the entire space center to a different planet, but haven't been able to find any leads. I want to play career mode on a different planet. I imagine starting out on Laythe, or Dres, or Eeloo. I am willing to try and make it happen myself, but I have no modding experience, and haven't been able to find any file to edit to get my way.

Can anybody help me out here? Either to create a mod or something to make it possible to move the space center, or to point me in the right direction.

AFAIK people have tried and it's not currently possible; KSC must be on Kerbin. You can move Kerbin.

The closest thing to an off-world KSC is [Extraplanetary Launchpads](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59545).
Try installing <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> move
